response.original_title: Charlotte Film Festival Shorts Programs: CONNECT / DISCONNECT (Narrative Shorts #2)
response.overview: Connection comes in many formsâ€”a pregnant woman yearning for a one-night stand, a late-night conversation with an android escort, even a fight between two people in a desert afterlife for one spot back on Earth. This collection of narrative short films captures the small, surprising moments where something real begins to take shape. Titles: Celeste in Spring | BALDY The Film | Lend a FRND | LOVE MACHINE | Honeywell | DISC | Out for Delivery
response.title: Charlotte Film Festival Shorts Programs: CONNECT / DISCONNECT (Narrative Shorts #2)
